title: AI Strategy Completeness Assessment
description: Interactive radar chart tool for assessing AI strategy document completeness and quality across ten key dimensions with improvement suggestions
creator: Claude Code
subject: AI Strategy
Assessment
Capstone Project
Strategy Document
learningObjectives: Evaluate strategy documents against quality criteria
Analyze gaps and weaknesses in AI strategies
Create improvement plans for identified gaps

controls.name: Section Present
controls.description: Mark whether each strategy section is included

controls.name: Weak Example
controls.description: Load an example weak strategy assessment

controls.name: Strong Example
controls.description: Load an example strong strategy assessment

assumptions: All ten dimensions are equally weighted
Quality can be meaningfully assessed on a 5-point scale
Missing sections score 0 in overall calculations
limitations: Does not capture interdependencies between sections
Cannot evaluate actual content, only presence and perceived quality
